origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_market_size', 'description': 'This function provides the market size and growth trend of a specified market type for a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'marketType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of market, e.g., consumerFinance, realEstate.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the market size is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketSize', 'description': 'The size of the market in the specified year.'}, {'name': 'growthTrend', 'description': 'The growth trend of the market.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
我需要分析消费金融市场。首先，获取消费金融市场的规模和增长趋势。
